name: YouTube
description: Lightweight YouTube browser for TrimUI devices with Smart Stream and enhanced channel system
author: tenlevels (modification by irvanvir12)

changelog.v1.1.0: Added Smart Stream System with multi-format fallback (progressive + DASH), improved download engine with stable progress display, enhanced channel system (Get Last Five now supports streaming and downloading), Download Latest with direct progress support, better format compatibility (AVC1 + MP4A), improved stream stability and error handling
changelog.v1.0.0: It supports video search, channel subscriptions, streaming via MPV, and downloading videos directly to your SD card
